title: Java + Spring Boot CRUD
description: This project was developed using **Java** and **Spring Boot** utilizing **JPA** and **Hibernate** to interact with **MySQL** and using **Docker** to containerize the application, providing **CRUD** operations through a **RESTful API** and includes **DTOs** for data transfer, also **dependency injection**, automated management of user data, a **modular architecture** designed for **scalability** and **best practices** in software design patterns and security.

title: Real Time Chat
description: This project is a real-time chat application made with **Javascript** using **WebSockets** and **DOM** manipulation. The application allows users to send and receive messages instantly through an intuitive web interface.

title: List App
description: Developed a list application using **React Native**, integrating **CRUD** operations (Create, Remove, Update, Delete) with **SQLite** database integration. Implemented utilizing **React design patterns** for optimized structure and maintainability, and deployed with **Expo** for ensuring efficient deployment.

title: Landing Page
description: This static responsible landing page was made with **HTML** and **CSS** only, using **BEM** methodology and **Atomic CSS**.
